title: Bad Meetings
itunes:title: Bad Meetings
description: Meeting dread—It's real. Tony and Amy share principles for meetings that work (aka: meetings that don't waste time and money and actually help create positive action), and a quick formula to self-assess your organization's meeting track record.
content:encoded: Meeting dread—It's real. Tony and Amy share principles for meetings that work (aka: meetings that don't waste time and money and actually help create positive action), and a quick formula to self-assess your organization's meeting track record.
itunes:subtitle: Why They're Bad & How to Make Them Better
itunes:author: Tony Morgan
